inputs.name: artifactoryConnection
inputs.label: Artifactory service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service to be used by this task.

inputs.name: buildName
inputs.label: Build name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build name to discard builds from.
To use the default build name of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.DefinitionName)'.

inputs.name: maxDays
inputs.label: Max days
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum number of days to keep builds in Artifactory.

inputs.name: maxBuilds
inputs.label: Max builds
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum number of builds to store in Artifactory.

inputs.name: excludeBuilds
inputs.label: Exclude builds
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of build numbers in the form of "value1,value2,...", that should not be removed from Artifactory.

inputs.name: deleteArtifacts
inputs.label: Delete artifacts
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, automatically removes build artifacts stored in Artifactory.

inputs.name: async
inputs.label: Async
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, build discard will run asynchronously and will not wait for response.
